full_text: Make a seamless knit jacket for your active little toddler. Knit top-down and featuring the beautifully soft and fleecy texture of Bernat Forever Fleece Finest, the hood is picked up along the neck edge and shaped as you knit. Practice knit, knit 2 together, slip slip knit, and increase techniques. Available in 6-24 month sizes, this pattern makes a great first garment project. MATERIALS Bernat® Forever Fleece Finest™ (9.9 oz/280 g; 888 yds/812 m) Sizes 6 12 18 24 mos Aqua Heather (18001) 1 1 1 1 ball Finished chest 6 mos 20” 51 cm 12 mos 22” 56 cm 18 mos 23” 58.5 cm 24 mos 25” 63.5 cm
